document_data.name: ''Potion of Arcane Absorption''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Potions of arcane absorption''''' were a rare type of [[potion]] that protected the imbiber from spells and magical effects.
document_data.Description: These potions were typically kept in wide-neck [[ceramic]] [[jar]]s in the [[Northwest Faerûn]]. Each contained enough liquid for one full dose.
document_data.Powers: ''Potions of arcane absorption'' gave the imbiber protection against magic via absorption and negating of the offensive spells and magical effects. The effects of the potion were permanent.
